price: They said, “O Moses, will you throw first or will we be the first to throw?”
arabic: قَالُواْ يَٰمُوسَىٰٓ إِمَّآ أَن تُلۡقِيَ وَإِمَّآ أَن نَّكُونَ نَحۡنُ ٱلۡمُلۡقِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
